quotes.text: Sharing tales of those we've lost is how we keep from really losing them.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.text: I should feel the air move against me, and feel the things I touched, instead of having only to look at them. I'm sure life is all wrong because it has become much too visual - we can neither hear nor feel nor understand, we can only see. I'm sure that is entirely wrong.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.text: You can go your whole life collecting days, and none will outweigh the one you wish you had back.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.text: There are several ways to react to being lost. One is to panic: this was usually Valentina's first impulse. Another is to abandon yourself to lostness, to allow the fact that you've misplaced yourself to change the way you experience the world.
quotes.author: Audrey Niffenegger

quotes.text: No lake so still but it has its wave.No circle so perfect but that it has its blur.I would change things for you if I could; As I can't you must take them as they are.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: ...I told him a story of two people. Two people who shouldn't have met, and who didn't like each other much when they did, but who found they were the only two people in the world who could possibly have understood each other.
quotes.author: Jojo Moyes

quotes.text: I think the only answer is to live life to the fullest while you can and collect memories like fools collect money. Because in the end, that's all you have - happy memories.
quotes.author: Sarah Strohmeyer

quotes.text: Look. I have a strategy. Why expect anything? If you don't expect anything, you don't get disappointed.
quotes.author: Patricia McCormick

quotes.text: The Lord prefers common-looking people. That is why he made so many of them.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Don't lose heart if it's very difficult at times, everything will come out all right and nobody can in the beginning do as he wishes.
quotes.author: Vincent Willem van Gogh

quotes.text: Stop giving other people the power to control your happiness, your mind, and your life. If you don't take control of yourself and your own life, someone else is bound to try.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.text: But all I could think of was how when nothing made sense and hadn't for ages, you just have to grab onto anything you feel sure of.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.text: If you are not the hero of your own story, then you're missing the whole point of your humanity.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: I liked being a person. I wanted to keep at it.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.text: What's done is done. What's gone is gone. One of life's lessons is always moving on. It's okay to look back to see how far you've come but keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: We live in a dark and romantic and quite tragic world.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.text: Why not just live in the moment, especially if it has a good beat?
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.text: The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know.
quotes.author: Michel Legrand

quotes.text: You won't lag behind, because you'll have the speed. You'll pass the whole gang and you'll soon take the lead.Wherever you fly, you'll be best of the best.Wherever you go, you will top all the rest.Except when you don't.Because, sometimes, you won't.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: The world is merciless, and it's also very beautiful.
quotes.author: Hajime Isayama

quotes.text: There are two tragedies in life. One is to lose your heart's desire. The other is to gain it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Your beliefs affect your choices. Your choices shape your actions. Your actions determine your results. The future you create depends upon the choices you make and the actions you take today.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: All I know is I make sense to me- it's other people who seem complicated.
quotes.author: Tara Kelly

quotes.text: In the end, the world always wins. That's just the way of things.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.text: Life, it turns out, goes on. There is no cosmic rule that grants you immunity from the details just because you have come face-to-face with a catastrophe. The garbage can still overflow, the bills arrive in the mail, telemarketers, interrupt dinner.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.text: The more credit you give away, the more will come back to you. The more you help others, the more they will want to help you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: It doesn't matter who you are, or where you come from, or how much money you've got in your pocket. You have your own destiny and your own life ahead of you.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: Nothing ever becomes real till experienced '“ even a proverb is no proverb until your life has illustrated it
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.text: Part of me suspects that I'm a loser, and the other part of me thinks I'm God Almighty.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Non-judgment quiets the internal dialogue, and this opens once again the doorway to creativity.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.text: Thinking there is something better out there in the world, something worth more than you already have- of all my mistakes,that was my biggest.
quotes.author: Louise Candlish

quotes.text: In high seas or in low seas,I'm gonna be your friend...I'm gonna be your friend.In high tide or in low tide,I'll be by your side...I'll be by your side.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.text: You made me confess the fears that I have. But I will tell you also what I do not fear. I do not fear to be alone or to be spurned for another or to leave whatever I have to leave. And I am not afraid to make a mistake, even a great mistake, a lifelong mistake and perhaps as long as eternity too.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.text: Home wasn't a set house, or a single town on a map. It was wherever the people who loved you were, whenever you were together. Not a place, but a moment, and then another, building on each other like bricks to create a solid shelter that you take with you for your entire life, wherever you may go.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.text: They had an ordinary life, full of ordinary things-if love can ever be called that.
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.text: You better start swimming, or you'll sink like a stone. Because the Time's they are a-changing.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: Struggling and suffering are the essence of a life worth living. If you're not pushing yourself beyond the comfort zone, if you're not demanding more from yourself - expanding and learning as you go - you're choosing a numb existence. You're denying yourself an extraordinary trip.
quotes.author: Dean Karnazes

quotes.text: I am still in the land of the dying; I shall be in the land of the living soon. (his last words)
quotes.author: John Newton

quotes.text: If you spend your life sparing people's feelings and feeding their vanity, you get so you can't distinguish what should be respected in them.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: I'm dying and all I hear are insults!
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.text: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.text: When you live for many hundreds of years, you know that every opportunity will come again.
quotes.author: Philip Pullman

quotes.text: I had rather be shut up in a very modest cottage with my books, my family and a few old friends, dining on simple bacon, and letting the world roll on as it liked, than to occupy the most splendid post, which any human power can give.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Dead people can be our heroes because they cant disappoint us later; they only improve over time, as we forget more and more about them.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.text: The way you give your name to others is a measure of how much you like and respect yourself.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Everything that had happened was shockingly beautiful, enough to make you crazy.
quotes.author: Banana Yoshimoto

quotes.text: How would your life be different if'¦You stopped making negative judgmental assumptions about people you encounter? Let today be the day'¦You look for the good in everyone you meet and respect their journey.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Love only grows by sharing. You can only have more for yourself by giving it away to others.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Muscles aching to work, minds aching to create - this is man.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.text: All human beings have three lives: public, private, and secret.
quotes.author: Gabriel GarcÃƒÂ­a MÃƒÂ¡rquez

quotes.text: It was always the becoming he dreamed of, never the being.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: The only person who can pull me down is myself, and I'm not going to let myself pull me down anymore.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: Why did I write? Because I found life unsatisfactory.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.text: She should have done science, not spent all her time with her head in novels. Novels gave you a completely false idea about life, they told lies and they implied there were endings when in reality there were no endings, everything just went on and on and on.
quotes.author: Kate Atkinson

quotes.text: Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. If they don't, they never were.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.text: A lot of the conflict you have in your life exists simply because you're not living in alignment; you're not be being true to yourself.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: It is our wounds that create in us a desire to reach for miracles. The fulfillment of such miracles depends on whether we let our wounds pull us down or lift us up towards our dreams.
quotes.author: Jocelyn Soriano

quotes.text: Most people gaze neither into the past nor the future; they explore neither truth nor lies. They gaze at the television.
quotes.author: Radiohead

quotes.text: Then I discovered that being related is no guarantee of love!
quotes.author: Stieg Larsson

quotes.text: You are -- your life, and nothing else.
quotes.author: JeanPaul Sartre

quotes.text: I can do this'¦ I can start over. I can save my own life and I'm never going to be alone as long as I have stars to wish on and people to still love.
quotes.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quotes.text: Life is a comedy to those who think, a tragedy to those who feel.
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.text: There are no classes in life for beginners: right away you are always asked to deal with what is most difficult.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.text: I don't judge people. It blurs out the center of my attention,my focus, myself.
quotes.author: Toba Beta [Betelgeuse Incident]

quotes.text: We know from daily life that we exist for other people first of all, for whose smiles and well-being our own happiness depends.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life, but define yourself.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.text: There's no need to wait for the bad things and bullshit to be over. Change now. Love now. Live now. Don't wait for people to give you permission to live, because they won't.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.text: In life, more than in anything else, it isn't easy to end up alive.
quotes.author: Roman Payne

quotes.text: Too late, I found you can't wait to become perfect, you got to go out and fall down and get up with everybody else.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: I want to see beauty. In the ugly, in the sink, in the suffering, in the daily, in all the days before I die, the moments before I sleep.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.text: See, the poor dream all their lives of getting enough to eat and looking like the rich. And what do the rich dream of?? Losing weight and looking like the poor.
quotes.author: Aravind Adiga

quotes.text: You must not ever stop being whimsical. And you must not, ever, give anyone else the responsibility for your life.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.text: Do not set aside your happiness. Do not wait to be happy in the future. The best time to be happy is always now.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: You are not the victim of the world, but rather the master of your own destiny. It is your choices and decisions that determine your destiny.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: You've never lived what you are thinking, and that isn't good. Only the ideas we actually live are of any value.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.text: I've come to believe that all my past failure and frustration were actually laying the foundation for the understandings that have created the new level of living I now enjoy.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.text: Don't be afraid of enemies who attack you. Be afraid of the friends who flatter you.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: He was mastered by the sheer surging of life, the tidal wave of being, the perfect joy of each separate muscle, joint, and sinew in that it was everything that was not death, that it was aglow and rampant, expressing itself in movement, flying exultantly under the stars.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.text: It is a fine thing to establish one's own religion in one's heart, not to be dependent on tradition and second-hand ideals. Life will seem to you, later, not a lesser, but a greater thing.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.text: Never respond to an angry person with a fiery comeback, even if he deserves it...Don't allow his anger to become your anger.
quotes.author: Bohdi Sanders

quotes.text: The great object of life is sensation- to feel that we exist, even though in pain.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: There are times I wish I were invisible. Which is silly, since I do everything I can to stand out.
quotes.author: Gena Showalter

quotes.text: Never compete with someone who has nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.text: Silence before being born, silence after death: life is nothing but noise between two unfathomable silences.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.text: Rise to the occassion which is life!
quotes.author: Virginia Euwer Wolff

quotes.text: The choices you make now, the people you surround yourself with, they all have the potential to affect your life, even who you are, forever.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.text: The only certainty life contains is death.
quotes.author: Patricia Briggs

quotes.text: It's amazing how quickly nature consumes human places after we turn our backs on them. Life is a hungry thing.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfeld

quotes.text: If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Life doesn't require ideals. It requires standards of action.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.text: Hard is trying to rebuild yourself, piece by piece, with no instruction book, and no clue as to where all the important bits are supposed to go.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.text: I don't get it,' Caroline said, bemused. 'She's the only one with wings. Why is that?'There were so many questions in life. You couldn't ever have all the answers. But I knew this one.It's so she can fly,' I said. Then I started to run.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.text: It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: They say I'm old-fashioned, and live in the past, but sometimes I think progress progresses too fast!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: I only want to write. And there's no college for that except life.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.text: You're only young once, but you can be immature forever
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.text: The reason why the universe is eternal is that it does not live for itself; it gives life to others as it transforms.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Nalaman kong habang lumalaki ka, maraming beses kang madadapa. Bumangon ka man ulit o hindi, magpapatuloy ang buhay, iikot ang mundo, at mauubos ang oras.
quotes.author: Bob Ong

quotes.text: One ChoiceOne Choice, decided your friends.One Choice, defines your beliefs.One Choice, determines your loyalties - Forever.ONCE CHOICE CAN TRANSFORM YOU
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.text: Life ... is a taleTold by an idiot, full of sound and fury,Signifying nothing.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: The universe may not always play fair, but at least it's got a hell of a sense of humor.
quotes.author: Candace Bushnell

quotes.text: I'm sorry for my inability to let unimportant things go, for my inability to hold on to the important things.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to be confused. Try to remain permanently confused. Anything is possible. Stay open, forever, so open it hurts, and then open up some more, until the day you die, world without end, amen.
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.text: Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Sometimes the greatest thing to come out of all your hard work isn't what you get for it, but what you become for it. Shake things up today! Be You...Be Free...Share.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: No matter how hard life is, don't lose hope
quotes.author: Zayn Malik

quotes.text: No amount of regretting can change the past, and no amount of worrying can change the future.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Don't confuse poor decision-making with destiny. Own your mistakes. It's ok; we all make them. Learn from them so they can empower you!
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: In examining disease, we gain wisdom about anatomy and physiology and biology. In examining the person with disease, we gain wisdom about life.
quotes.author: Oliver W. Sacks

quotes.text: Personally, I don't like inherently happy people. I don't trust them. I think there's something seriously wrong with anyone who isn't at least a little let down by the world.
quotes.author: Tiffanie DeBartolo

quotes.text: It's probably my job to tell you life isn't fair, but I figure you already know that. So instead, I'll tell you that hope is precious, and you're right not to give up.
quotes.author: C.J. Redwine

quotes.text: Do you know what your problem is? You can't live with the idea that someone might leave.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.text: Life consists of two days, one for you one against you. So when it's for you don't be proud or reckless, and when it's against you be patient, for both days are test for you.
quotes.author: Hazrat Ali Ibn AbuTalib A.S

quotes.text: My diagnosis," he said"for better or worse,is that your son is the resultof an old pharaoh's curse.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.text: Life's greatest gift is the freedom it leaves you to step out of it whenever you choose.
quotes.author: AndrÃƒÂ© Breton

quotes.text: Don't wait for things to happen. Make them happen.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: When we're connected to others, we become better people.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.text: I have a deeply hidden and inarticulate desire for something beyond the daily life.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: The past is a place of reference, not a place of residence; the past is a place of learning, not a place of living.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Live authentically. Why would you continue to compromise something that's beautiful to create something that is fake?
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Life is a book and there are a thousand pages I have not yet read.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.text: Life is only precious because it ends, kid. Take it from a god. You mortals don't know how lucky you are
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.text: There's nowhere you can be that isn't where you're meant to be...
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Life happens. Shit happens. And it happens a lot. To a lot of people.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.text: The absence of the will to live is, alas, not sufficient to make one want to die.
quotes.author: Michel Houellebecq

quotes.text: All the world is made of faith, and trust, and pixie dust.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.text: Make the most of the best and the best of the worst, and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Be an Encourager: When you encourage others, you boost their self-esteem, enhance their self-confidence, make them work harder, lift their spirits and make them successful in their endeavors. Encouragement goes straight to the heart and is always available. Be an encourager. Always.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: All religions, arts and sciences are branches of the same tree. All these aspirations are directed toward ennobling man's life, lifting it from the sphere of mere physical existence and leading the individual towards freedom."[Moral Decay (first published 1937)]
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I hate to say it, but shit really does happen. You just have to get over it. Beat the hell out of it by doing things that make you happy.
quotes.author: J.A. Redmerski

quotes.text: The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Smile more. Smiling can make you and others happy.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Love changes what is probable and makes unlikely things possible.
quotes.author: Ally Condie

quotes.text: Why didn't I learn to treat everything like it was the last time. My greatest regret was how much I believed in the future.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.text: Life' wrote a friend of mine, 'is a public performance on the violin, in which you must learn the instrument as you go along.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.text: Know that the same spark of life that is within you, is within all of our animal friends, the desire to live is the same within all of us...
quotes.author: Rai Aren

quotes.text: I know it seems hard sometimes but remember one thing. Through every dark night, there's a bright day after that. So no matter how hard it get, stick your chest out, keep ya head up.... and handle it.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.text: I think the highest and lowest points are the important ones. Anything else is just...in between.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.text: We're all made of stories. When they finally put us underground, the stories are what will go on. Not forever, perhaps, but for a time. It's a kind of immortality, I suppose, bounded by limits, it's true, but then so's everything.
quotes.author: Charles de Lint

quotes.text: I don't want to do anything. I don't even want to start this day because then I'll just be expected to finish it.
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell

quotes.text: The world's greatest achievers have been those who have always stayed focussed on their goals and have been consistent in their efforts.
quotes.author: Dr Roopleen

quotes.text: I felt once more how simple and frugal a thing is happiness: a glass of wine, a roast chestnut, a wretched little brazier, the sound of the sea. Nothing else.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.text: Here's to freedom, cheers to art. Here's to having an excellent adventure and may the stopping never start.
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.text: Life isn't a book. There's no guarantee of a happy ending.
quotes.author: Kristin Cast

quotes.text: A stumble may prevent a fall.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.text: I feel sorry for anyone who is in a place where he feels strange and stupid.
quotes.author: Lois Lowry

quotes.text: What a waste my life would be without all the beautiful mistakes I've made.
quotes.author: Alice Bag

quotes.text: Some things you hear with your ears. Others, you hear with your heart.
quotes.author: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.text: I had a dream about you. I was sitting on your couch, relating my succession of ideas on subconscious influence. I asked you what they meant, and you told me that free associations were a bad way to advance my political career.
quotes.author: Bauvard

quotes.text: There's a really stupid saying: When life hands you a lemon, make lemonade. Well, I have a better saying: When life hands you a lemon, shove that lemon up its stupid butt.
quotes.author: Gena Showalter

quotes.text: One always has a better book in one's mind than one can manage to get onto paper.
quotes.author: Michael Cunningham

quotes.text: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: Changing is what people do when they have no options left.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.text: You know why love stories have happy endings?' I shake my head.'œBecause they end too early,' she continues. 'œThey always end right at the kiss. You never have to see all the bullshit that comes later. You know, Life.
quotes.author: Hank Moody

quotes.text: You don't get to pick where you're from, but you always have control of where you're going.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.text: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome."[Meditations Divine and Moral]
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.text: Your time may come. Do not be too sad, Sam. You cannot be always torn in two. You will have to be one and whole, for many years. You have so much to enjoy and to be, and to do.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.text: You don't put your life into your books, you find it there.
quotes.author: Alan Bennett

quotes.text: The longer we live, the more weight we carry in our hearts.
quotes.author: Ai Yazawa

quotes.text: There are some places in life where you can only go alone. Embrace the beauty of your solo journey.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.text: You cannot change anyone, but you can be the reason someone changes.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Life is no brief candle to me. It is a sort of splendid torch which I have got a hold of for the moment, and I want to make it burn as brightly as possible before handing it on to future generations.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: He was unheeded, happy, and near to the wild heart of life. He was alone and young and wilful and wildhearted, alone amid a waste of wild air and brackish waters and the seaharvest of shells and tangle and veiled grey sunlight.
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

quotes.text: If you have a goal, write it down. If you do not write it down, you do not have a goal - you have a wish.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: Participate in your dreams today. There are unlimited opportunities available with this new day. Take action on those wonderful dreams you've had in your mind for so long. Remember, success is something you experience when you act accordingly.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Only when you accept that one day you'll die can you let go, and make the best out of life. And that's the big secret. That's the miracle.
quotes.author: Gabriel BÃƒÂ¡

quotes.text: Not in his speech, not in his thoughts, I see his greatness, only in his actions, in his life.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.text: If the whole universe has no meaning, we should never have found out that it has no meaning: just as, if there were no light in the universe and therefore no creatures with eyes, we should never know it was dark. Dark would be without meaning.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: I am incapable of conceiving infinity, and yet I do not accept finity. I want this adventure that is the context of my life to go on without end.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.text: Autobiography begins with a sense of being alone. It is an orphan form.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.text: Push yourself to do more and to experience more. Harness your energy to start expanding your dreams. Yes, expand your dreams. Don't accept a life of mediocrity when you hold such infinite potential within the fortress of your mind. Dare to tap into your greatness.

quotes.text: if i'm going to fuck up my life, does it really matter which way i do it?.

No place... Nothing outside you can give you any place... In yourself right now is all the place you've got.

quotes.text: A kiss may ruin a human life

quotes.text: Nothing in life is worth,turning your back on,if you love it.

quotes.text: Life is an adventure of passion, risk, danger, laughter, beauty, love; a burning curiosity to go with the action to see what it is all about, to go search for a pattern of meaning, to burn one's bridges because you're never going to go back anyway, and to live to the end.

quotes.author: J.R. Ward

quotes.text: dont be afraid of death, be afraid of the unlived life.

quotes.text: I go to seek a Great Perhaps.

quotes.text: A bend in the road is not the end of the road'¦Unless you fail to make the turn.

quotes.text: You are a child of the universe, no less than the trees and the stars; you have a right to be here. And whether or not it is clear to you, no doubt the universe is unfolding as it should.

quotes.text: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.

quotes.text: You are in charge of your own happiness; you don't need to wait for other people's permission to be happy.

quotes.text: Lottery: A tax on people who are bad at math.

quotes.text: There are things you can't walk away from. Not if you want to live with yourself afterward.

quotes.text: If people do not believe that mathematics is simple, it is only because they do not realize how complicated life is.

We carry accumulation of years in our bodies, and on our faces, but generally our real selves, the children inside, are innocent and shy as magnolias.

quotes.text: You look ridiculous if you danceYou look ridiculous if you don't danceSo you might as welldance.

quotes.text: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.

quotes.text: Whether you like it or not, you are committed to the human endeavor. I cannot ally myself with such a purely negative goal as avoidance of suffering. Suffering is a chance you take by the fact of being alive.

quotes.text: All opinions are not equal. Some are a very great deal more robust, sophisticated and well supported in logic and argument than others.

quotes.text: Stories you read when you're the right age never quite leave you. You may forget who wrote them or what the story was called. Sometimes you'll forget precisely what happened, but if a story touches you it will stay with you, haunting the places in your mind that you rarely ever visit.

These times are not necessarily good, and not necessarily bad. In fact, what they are depends on what *we* are.

quotes.text: Cinema is the ultimate pervert art. It doesn't give you what you desire - it tells you how to desire.
quotes.author: Slavoj Ã…Â½iÃ…Â¾ek

quotes.text: Stay hungry, stay young, stay foolish, stay curious, and above all, stay humble because just when you think you got all the answers, is the moment when some bitter twist of fate in the universe will remind you that you very much don't.

quotes.text: One day you will be the one called Master (Naruto). You'll be the one to treat others to ramen. We can't stay kids forever."- Shikamaru Nara (Naruto)

quotes.text: Hurt is a part of life. To be honest, I think hurt is a part of happiness, that our definition of happiness has gotten very narrow lately, very nervous, a little afraid of this brawling, fabulous, unpredictable world.

quotes.text: One swallow does not make a summer, neither does one fine day; similarly one day or brief time of happiness does not make a person entirely happy.

That's what I've taken from the therapy sessions: the holes in your life are permanent. You have to grow around them, like tree roots around concrete; you mold yourself through the gaps

quotes.text: The more you seek security, the less of it you have. But the more you seek opportunity, the more likely it is that you will achieve the security that you desire.

quotes.text: Sometimes it's better to stop trying to make sense of things. Life isn't clear cut, there are always gray areas.

quotes.text: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them

quotes.text: Going back to something is harder than you think.

quotes.text: Most of what matters in our lives takes place in our absence.

quotes.text: Some days you must learn a great deal. But you should also have days when you allow what is already in you to swell up and touch everything. If you never let that happen, then you just accumulate facts, and they begin to rattle around inside of you.

quotes.text: I want words at my funeral. But I guess that means you need life in your life.

quotes.text: For those who believe, no proof is necessary. For those who don't believe, no proof is possible.

quotes.text: You will have to make up for the smallness of your size by your courage and selfless devotion to duty, for it is not life that matters, but the courage, fortitude and determination you bring to it.

quotes.text: I envy people that know love. That have someone who takes them as they are.

quotes.text: Live your life. Be happy as you can be, let go of the things that don't matter, and fight.

quotes.text: That's how it is on this bitch of an earth.

quotes.text: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

quotes.text: Almost nobody dances sober, unless they happen to be insane.

quotes.text: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.

quotes.text: I was lost yesterday, I am found today and I will be forgotten tomorrow.

quotes.text: One of the best ways to influence people is to make those around you feel important.

quotes.text: There's more to life than love.

quotes.text: He had the look of one who had drunk the cup of life and found a dead beetle at the bottom.

quotes.text: This is a wonderful day, I have never seen this one before.

quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness.

quotes.text: When life doesn't meet your expectations, it was important to take it with grace.

quotes.text: Power does not corrupt. Fear corrupts... perhaps the fear of a loss of power.

quotes.author: Jojo Moyes

quotes.text: I really think I write about everyday life. I don't think I'm quite as odd as others say I am. Life is intrinsically, well, boring and dangerous at the same time. At any given moment the floor may open up. Of course, it almost never does; that's what makes it so boring.

quotes.text: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.

quotes.text: You will have five hundred million little bells, and I shall have five hundred million springs of fresh water...
quotes.author: Antoine de SaintExupÃƒÂ©ry

quotes.text: The world is 3 days: As for yesterday, it has vanished along with all that was in it. As for tomorrow, you may never see it. As for today, it is yours, so work on it.

quotes.text: and every day I thank [God] that I am alive, not because I fear death, but because my wife has a husband and my son is not an orphan.

quotes.text: Today is the only day in which we have any power.

quotes.text: You had to risk your life to get love. You had to get right to the edge of death to ever be saved.

quotes.text: CALVIN:As usual goodness hardly puts up a fight.

quotes.text: What makes big boobs and perkiness so attractive to boys? I mean, really. Two round, mounds of fat and a fake smile. Yeah, winning attributes.
quotes.author: Gena Showalter

quotes.text: This new day has greeted us with no rules; unconditional opportunity. Do not dilute the power of this new day with the hardship of yesterday. Greet this day the way it has greeted you; with open arms and endless possibility.

quotes.text: I don't understand dating.. and the other things that people do.. all I know is that you ought to find the one you recognize. The one who gives you four arms, four legs, four eyes, and has the other half of your heart. There's only one of those, so what are all the other things for? Like dating?
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: Tell me not in mournful numbers,Life is but an empty dream!For the soul is dead that slumbers,And things are not what they seem.Life is real! Life is earnest!And the grave is not its goal;Dust thou are, to dust thou returnest,Was not spoken of the soul.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: Live the Life of Your Dreams: Be brave enough to live the life of your dreams according to your vision and purpose instead of the expectations and opinions of others.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: But fate, as Merlin always taught us, is inexorable. Life is a jest of the Gods, Merlin liked to claim, and there is no justice. You must learn to laugh, he once told me, or else you'll just weep yourself to death.
quotes.author: Bernard Cornwell

quotes.text: Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: You are someone who is different, but who wants to be the same as everyone else. And that in my view is a serious illness. God chose you to be different. Why are you disappointing God with this kind of attitude?

quotes.text: Everyone has his own reality in which, if one is not too cautious, timid or frightened, one swims. This is the only reality there is.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.text: Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire.

quotes.text: You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone.

quotes.text: You just have to go after what you want and if it doesn't want you back then so be it; it doesn't deserve you anyways.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.text: You might be tempted to avoid the messiness of daily living for the tranquility of stillness and peacefulness. This of course would be an attachment to stillness, and like any strong attachment, it leads to delusion. It arrests development and short-circuits the cultivation of wisdom.
quotes.author: Jon KabatZinn

quotes.text: I'd found out that if you pushed people away hard enough, they tended to go.

quotes.text: Hope is such a beautiful word, but it often seems very fragile. Life is still being needlessly hurt and destroyed.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.text: Art is to console those who are broken by life.

quotes.text: It's worth making time to find the things that really stir your soul. That's what makes you really feel alive. You have to say '˜no' to other things you're used to, and do it with all your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: He who robs us of our dreams robs us of our life.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: If I never went home, what exactly would I be missing? I pictured my cold cavernous house, my friendless town full of bad memories, the utterly unremarkable life that had been mapped out for me. It had never once occurred to me, I realized, to refuse it.

quotes.text: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Maybe everyone can live beyond what they're capable of.

quotes.text: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of happy mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.text: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors for you where there were only walls.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: The right thing and the easy thing are never the same.
quotes.author: Kami Garcia

quotes.text: It's never overreacting to ask for what you want and need.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.text: Wisdom is knowing I am nothing,Love is knowing I am everything,and between the two my life moves.
quotes.author: Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.text: So shut up, live, travel, adventure, bless and don't be sorry
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.text: If you need something from somebody always give that person a way to hand it to you.

quotes.text: In fairy tales, the princesses kiss the frogs, and the frogs become princes. In real life, the pricesses kiss princes, and the princes turn into frogs.

quotes.text: Those who hurt others will also hurt themselves.

quotes.text: Books can be dangerous. The best ones should be labeled '˜This could change your life'.
quotes.author: Helen Exley

quotes.text: She cracked a smile. "So what's your poison?" He sighed dramatically, and let the truth tumble off his tongue. "Life." "Ah," she said ruefully. "That'll kill you.
quotes.author: Victoria Schwab

quotes.text: Life has no meaning, the moment you lose the illusion of being eternal.
quotes.author: JeanPaul Sartre

quotes.text: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems -- not people; to focus your energies on answers -- not excuses.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Perhaps it would be simpler if you just did what you're told and didn't try to understand things.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: Her happiness floated like waves of ocean along the coast of her life. She found lyrics of her life in his arms but she never sung her song.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.text: I run after her, not really giving chase. I'm running because I can, because I must.Because I want to see how far I can go before I have to stop.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.text: I am not good at noticing when I'm happy, except in retrospect.
quotes.author: Tana French

quotes.text: Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: To regret one's own experiences is to arrest one's own development. To deny one's own experiences is to put a lie into the lips of one's own life. It is no less than a denial of the soul.

quotes.text: This life is for loving, sharing, learning, smiling, caring, forgiving, laughing, hugging, helping, dancing, wondering, healing, and even more loving. I choose to live life this way. I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, 'aw shit, he's up!
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Leonard asks me if there's anything I need to know before he dies, I think about it for a minute, turn to him, say what's the meaning of life, Leonard? He laughs, says that's an easy one, my son, it's whatever you want it to be.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.text: The trick is to enjoy life. Don't wish away your days, waiting for better ones ahead.
quotes.author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quotes.text: Being faithful in the smallest things is the way to gain, maintain, and demonstrate the strength needed to accomplish something great.
quotes.author: Alex Harris

quotes.text: How quick come the reasons for approving what we like.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.text: I missed you, Angel. Not one day went by that I didn't feel you missing from my life. You haunted me to the point that I began to believe Hank had gone back on his oath and killed you. I couldn't escape you and I didn't want to. You tortured me, but it was better than losing you.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.text: ... you don't have to wait for someone to treat you bad repeatedly. All it takes is once, and if they get away with it that once, if they know they can treat you like that, then it sets the pattern for the future.
quotes.author: Jane Green

quotes.text: Oh, Life, I am yours. Whatever it is you want of me, I am ready to give.
quotes.author: William Steig

quotes.text: Never stop smiling not even when you're sad, someone might fall in love with your smile.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.text: Life sucks, then you die. Then it sucks again.
quotes.author: Tonya Hurley

quotes.text: Strange, I thought, how you can be living your dreams and your nightmares at the very same time.
quotes.author: Ransom Riggs

quotes.text: Some things take so longBut how do I explainWhen not too many peopleCan see we're all the sameAnd because of all their tearsYour eyes can't hope to seeThe beauty that surrounds themNow, isn't it a pity
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.text: Right now, I had everything I could ask for. It wasn't a long list, but it was a very satisfying one, starting with the love of my life back in my arms.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.text: That's all you can do in this world, no matter how strong the current beats against you, or how heavy your burden, or how tragic your love story. You keep going.
quotes.author: Robyn Schneider

quotes.text: Wisdom is having things right in your lifeand knowing why.
quotes.author: William Stafford

quotes.text: In the short term, it would make me happy to go play outside. In the long term, it would make me happier to do well at school and become successful. But in the VERY long term, I know which will make better memories.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: Before I can live with other folks I've got to live with myself. The one thing that doesn't abide by majority rule is a person's conscience.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.text: Einmal ist keinmal, says Tomas to himself. What happens but once, says the German adage, might as well not have happened at all. If we have only one life to live, we might as well not have lived at all.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.text: Life is neither static nor unchanging. With no individuality, there can be no change, no adaptation and, in an inherently changing world, any species unable to adapt is also doomed.
quotes.author: Jean M. Auel

quotes.text: Totally without hope one cannot live. To live without hope is to cease to live. Hell is hopelessness. It is no accident that above the entrance to Dante's hell is the inscription: "Leave behind all hope, you who enter here.
quotes.author: Jurgen Moltmann

quotes.text: I am suddenly comsumed by nostalgia for the little girl who was me, who loved the fields and believed in God, who spent winter days home sick from school reading Nancy Drew and sucking menthol cough drops, who could keep a secret.
quotes.author: Audrey Niffenegger

quotes.text: To put meaning in one's life may end in madness,But life without meaning is the tortureOf restlessness and vague desire--It is a boat longing for the sea and yet afraid.
quotes.author: Edgar Lee Masters

quotes.text: Isn't it queer: there are only two or three human stories, and they go on repeating themselves as fiercely as if they had never happened before; like the larks in this country, that have been singing the same five notes over for thousands of years.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.text: All this twaddle, the existence of God, atheism, determinism, liberation, societies, death, etc., are pieces of a chess game called language, and they are amusing only if one does not preoccupy oneself with 'winning or losing this game of chess.
quotes.author: Marcel Duchamp

quotes.text: Leaders are limited by their vision rather than by their abilities.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Romance novels are birthday cake and life is often peanut butter and jelly. I think everyone should have lots of delicious romance novels lying around for those times when the peanut butter of life gets stuck to the roof of your mouth.
quotes.author: Janet Evanovich

quotes.text: Living might mean taking chances, but they're worth taking. Loving might be a mistake. but its worth making
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.text: As you grow up, always tell the truth, do no harm to others, and don't think you are the most important being on earth. Rich or poor, you then can look anyone in the eye and say, 'I'm probably no better than you, but I'm certainly your equal.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.text: I'm sure you think that I don't understand what you're going through, but I do. It's just that sometimes, our future is dictated by what we are, opposed to what we want.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.text: It's funny how, in this journey of life, even though we may begin at different times and places, our paths cross with others so that we may share our love, compassion, observations, and hope. This is a design of God that I appreciate and cherish.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: What about the rest of your life?"She shrugged. "What about it?""Aren't you worried about, like, forever?""Forever is composed of nows," she says.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.text: I like flaws. I think they make things interesting.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.text: The story of life is quicker than the wink of an eye, the story of love is hello and goodbye...until we meet again
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: There's no such thing as ruining your life. Life's a pretty resilient thing, it turns out.
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.text: No matter how much suffering you went through, you never wanted to let go of those memories.
quotes.author: haruki murakami

quotes.text: Home is where somebody notices when you are no longer there.
quotes.author: Aleksandar Hemon

quotes.text: You can't be brave if you've only had wonderful things happen to you.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.text: What we like to think of ourselves and what we really are rarely have much in common....
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: Sometimes it takes a good fall to really know where you stand
quotes.author: Hayley Williams

quotes.text: Give me strength, not to be better than my enemies, but to defeat my greatest enemy, the doubts within myself. Give me strength for a straight back and clear eyes, so when life fades, as the setting sun, my spirit may come to you without shame.
quotes.author: P.C. Cast & Kristin Cast

quotes.text: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Do every act of your life as though it were the very last act of your life.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.text: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances, Be more active, Show up more often.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: In a well-ordered universe...
quotes.author: Morgan Matson

quotes.text: To leave, after all, was not the same as being left.
quotes.author: Anita Shreve

quotes.text: The Young Man came to the Old Man seeking counsel.I broke something, Old Man.How badly is it broken?It's in a million little pieces.I'm afraid I can't help you.Why?There's nothing you can do.Why?It can't be fixed.Why?It's broken beyond repair. It's in a million little pieces.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.text: What if life could be this way? Only the happy parts, none of the terrible, not even the mildly unpleasant. What if we could just cut out the bad and keep the good? This is what I want to do with Violet - give her only the good, keep away the bad, so that good is all we ever have around us.
quotes.author: Jennifer Niven

quotes.text: Life is but a memory Happened long ago. Theatre full of sadness For a long forgotten show.
quotes.author: Nick Drake

quotes.text: But that was the problem with having the answers. It was only after you gave them that you realized they sometimes weren't what people wanted to hear.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.text: So we forgive each other?" The crooked smile climbs up one more time. "Again?"And I look right into his eyes, right into him as far as I can see, because I want him to hear me, I want him to hear me with everything I mean and feel and say."Always," I say to him. "Every time.
quotes.author: Patrick Ness

quotes.text: Life is a slope. As long as you're going up you're always looking towards the top and you feel happy, but when you reach it, suddenly you can see the road going downhill and death at the end of it all. It's slow going up and quick going down.
quotes.author: Guy de Maupassant

quotes.text: I know there is no straight road No straight road in this world Only a giant labyrinth Of intersecting crossroads
quotes.author: Federico GarcÃƒÂ­a Lorca

quotes.text: She looked out the window; in her eyes was the light that you see only in children arriving at a new place, or in young people still open to new influences, still curious about the world because they have not yet been scarred by life.
quotes.author: Orhan Pamuk

quotes.text: Associate Yourself with People Who Think Positively: Associate yourself with people who think positively. You cannot surround yourself with negative people and expect positive outcomes.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Don't think about making life better for other people who don't even deserve you, rather, focus on making your life the best, for yourself and those who love you.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: If one has no sense of humor, one is in trouble.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.text: Now I've gone for too longLiving like I'm not aliveSo I'm going to start over tonightBeginning with you and I
quotes.author: Hayley Williams

quotes.text: Unexpected intrusions of beauty. This is what life is.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.text: Nothing can disturb your peace of mind unless you allow it to.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Strong people have a strong sense of self-worth and self-awareness; they don't need the approval of others.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.text: She thought about her life and how lost she'd felt for most of it. She thought about the way that all truths she'd been taught to consider valuable invariably conflicted with the world as it was actually lived. How could a person be so utterly lost, yet remain living?
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: Death is Peaceful, Life is Harder
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.text: Fame you'll be famous, as famous as can be, with everyone watching you win on TV, Except when they don't because sometimes they won't..
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Be thankful for everything that happens in your life; it's all an experience.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: I believe in looking reality straight in the eye and denying it.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.text: I know I'm not going to be in your head all the time. But once you know me, I'll be forever in your heart.Ã‚
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.text: What I want is so simple I almost can't say it: elementary kindness.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.text: Life's not black-and-white. Sometimes the ends justifies the means.
quotes.author: Emily Giffin

quotes.text: I learned...that inspiration does not come like a bolt, nor is it kinetic, energetic striving, but it comes into us slowly and quietly and all the time, though we must regularly and every day give it a little chance to start flowing, prime it with a little solitude and idleness.
quotes.author: Brenda Ueland

quotes.text: They're animals, all right. But why are you so goddam sure that makes us human beings?
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: Create your own miracles; do what you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Forget yesterday - it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow - you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift - today.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: All knowledge is worth having.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.text: There is no standard normal. Normal is subjective. There are seven billion versions of normal on this planet.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.text: It's not hard to decide what you want your life to be about. What's hard, she said, is figuring out what you're willing to give up in order to do the things you really care about.
quotes.author: Shauna Niequist

quotes.text: Good works is giving to the poor and the helpless, but divine works is showing them their worth to the One who matters.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.text: All that happens means something; nothing you do is ever insignificant.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: Do not lose hope '” what you seek will be found. Trust ghosts. Trust those that you have helped to help you in their turn. Trust dreams. Trust your heart, and trust your story. (from 'Instructions')
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: You cannot control the behavior of others, but you can always choose how you respond to it.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: The most important thing is this: to be able at any moment to be free to choose a life that makes you happy.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: There is more to life than simply increasing its speed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.text: The true definition of mental illness is when the majority of your time is spent in the past or future, but rarely living in the realism of NOW.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.text: Maybe everyone is just waiting for someone else to save them.
quotes.author: Margaret Peterson Haddix

quotes.text: That's how stories happen '” with a turning point, an unexpected twist. There's only one kind of happiness, but misfortune comes in all shapes and sizes. It's like Tolstoy said. Happiness is an allegory, unhappiness a story.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.text: People are going to say what they want to say and think what they want to think, and I can't change their minds.
quotes.author: Hilary Duff

quotes.text: This worldthat was our homefor a brief spellnever brought us anythingbut pain and grief;its a shame that not one of our problemswas ever solved.We departwith a thousand regretsin our hearts.
quotes.author: Omar KhayyÃƒÂ¡m

quotes.text: I think prime numbers are like life. They are very logical but you could never work out the rules, even if you spent all your time thinking about them
quotes.author: Mark Haddon

quotes.text: How far that little candle throws his beams! So shines a good deed in a weary world.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Don't let your luggage define your travels, each life unravels differently.
quotes.author: Shane Koyczan

quotes.text: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.text: If you own this story you get to write the ending.
quotes.author: BrenÃƒÂ© Brown

quotes.text: I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: "If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?" And whenever the answer has been "No" for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Desire is half of life; indifference is half of death.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.text: We do not need to eat animals, wear animals, or use animals for entertainment purposes, and our only defense of these uses is our pleasure, amusement, and convenience.
quotes.author: Gary L. Francione

quotes.text: When your sad--like really sad--you only want to be with other people who are sad.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.text: Having perfected our disguise, we spend our lives searching for someone we don't fool.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.text: The whole of life is just like watching a film. Only it's as though you always get in ten minutes after the big picture has started, and no-one will tell you the plot, so you have to work it out all yourself from the clues.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: You want to play house, you got to have a job. You want to play very nice house, very sweet house, then you got to have a job you don't like. Great. This is the way ninety-eight-point-nine per cent of the people work things out, so believe me, buddy, you've got nothing to apologize for.
quotes.author: Richard Yates

quotes.text: Learn to light a candle in the darkest moments of someone's life. Be the light that helps others see; it is what gives life its deepest significance.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Each player must accept the cards life deals him or her; but once they are in hand, he or she alone must decide how to play the cards in order to win the game.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Once your mindset changes, everything on the outside will change along with it.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Because, sometimes, things happen to people and they're not equipped to deal with them.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.text: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.text: You must draw from that strength. You must increase it. And you must hold on to it because sometimes that small glimmer of inner strength is all that we have to help us press forward through the darkness.
quotes.author: Morgan Rhodes

quotes.text: We all give up great expectations along the way.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz ZafÃƒÂ³n

quotes.text: Be the positive impact on the lives of others.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: As we go through life we gradually discover who we are, but the more we discover, the more we lose ourselves.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.text: I wish to weepbut sorrow isstupid.I wish to believebut belief is agraveyard.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.text: Be the kind of person who dares to face life's challenges and overcome them rather than dodging them.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: When you compare the sorrows of real life to the pleasures of the imaginary one, you will never want to live again, only to dream forever.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.text: I have given my word that only death will take me from you.
quotes.author: Philippa Gregory

quotes.text: I welcome questions. I hate assumptions.
quotes.author: Red Haircrow

quotes.text: The young always have the same problem - how to rebel and conform at the same time. They have now solved this by defying their parents and copying one another.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.text: How much I missed, simply because I was afraid of missing it.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: Love springs from the inside. It is the immortal surge of passion, excitement, energy, power, strength, prosperity, recognition, respect, desire, determination, enthusiasm, confidence, courage, and vitality, that nourishes, extends and protects. It possesses an external objective - life.
quotes.author: Ogwo David Emenike

quotes.text: To live is to be musical, starting with the blood dancing in your veins. Everything living has a rhythm. Do you feel your music?
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.text: This is the strangest life I have ever known.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.text: When you lose your smile, you lose your way in the chaos of life.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Don't waste your time in anger, regrets, worries, and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: The dead do not hurt you; only the living do.
quotes.author: Tess Gerritsen

quotes.text: It's funny how you can live somewhere your whole life, but not really see it.
quotes.author: Kami Garcia

quotes.text: I had to philosophize. Otherwise, I could not live in this world.
quotes.author: Edmund Husserl

quotes.text: Too many people spend money they haven't earned, to buy things they don't want, to impress people that they don't like.
quotes.author: Will Rogers
